description:
This course covers the basics of being an Uber driver. Then, it goes into detail with tips and suggestions on how to be a great Uber driver and achieve top ratings, as well as how to maximize your earnings. These tips and tricks can be applied to any ride-share platform (Lyft/Sidecar).

Your driver rating matters. It's in your best interest to maintain as high a rating as possible. Some of the incentives with maintaining a strong rating is being able to be an Xpert trainer.

I have given literally thousands of rides while maintaining a 4.89 rating. I'm also a certified Uber Xpert Trainer, so know that you're getting these tips and suggestions from an experienced, accomplished driver.

The course is taught presentation-style. It's beneficial to anyone who's currently an Uber driver, wants to become an Uber driver, is interested in how it all works, or is simply curious to know how things look from an Uber driver's perspective.
title: Uber Driving: Tips, Tricks, Earnings, & More!
